Title: Un giorno nella vita
Writer: Alessandro Blasetti, Mario Chiari, Diego Fabbri, Anton Giulio Majano, Cesare Zavattini
Actors: Elisa Cegani, Massimo Girotti, Mariella Lotti, Amedeo Nazzari
Plot: Some Italian partisans want to take refuge in a convent to escape German raids. The nuns are a little perplexed at first but then agree since one of the men is seriously wounded. When the partisans eventually leave, the Germans take a terrible revenge.
